Class GlobalExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
com.cafe.backend.exception.handler.GlobalExceptionHandler
@RestControllerAdvice public class GlobalExceptionHandler extends Object
GlobalExceptionHandler is a global exception handler for handling various types of exceptions thrown in the application. It is annotated with @RestControllerAdvice to handle exceptions globally for RESTful controllers.

This class provides methods to handle different types of exceptions and return appropriate HTTP responses with relevant status codes: - BadRequestException: Responds with HTTP 400 (Bad Request). - NotFoundException: Responds with HTTP 404 (Not Found). - AuthenticationCustomException: Responds with HTTP 403 (Forbidden). - ConcurrentModificationException: Responds with HTTP 500 (Internal Server Error). - Exception: Catches all other exceptions and responds with HTTP 500 (Internal Server Error).

      ex - the exception to handle.
      Returns:
      the exception message.

    • handleGlobalException

      @ExceptionHandler(Exception.class) @ResponseStatus(INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR) public String handleGlobalException(Exception ex)
      Handles generic Exception and returns a response with HTTP 500 status.
      Parameters:
      ex - the exception to handle.
      Returns:
      a generic error message indicating an unexpected error.
